price: Wͻn a wͻsi (amanfoͻ) kwan fri Onyankopͻn kwan so hwehwε sε (Onyankopͻn kwan no) bεkyea, saa nkorͻfoͻ no ne (Kaafirfoͻ) boniayεfoͻ no wͻ Daakye.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَبۡغُونَهَا عِوَجٗا وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yaṣuddūna ʿan sabīli al-lahi wayabghūnahā ʿiwajan wahum bil-ākhirati hum kāfirūna
